subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Denver has always boasted of two things: the mountains and the local N.F.L. team. The Rockies are still standing but the team has been racked by suicide, arrests, firings and losses.
snippet: Denver has always boasted of two things: the mountains and the local N.F.L. team. The Rockies are still standing but the team has been racked by suicide, arrests, firings and losses.
